name: Zibulon 2 - Multiplayer Co-op Edition
description:
Survive on an alien planet by exterminating the inhabitants with your friends!

Taking notes from the first game, Zibulon 2 features all new weapons, enemies, and items, along with the most important part, it's now co-op!

That's right, host a server and get your friends to join!

See how long you can survive against the never-ending waves of aliens. They get stronger and angrier with each passing wave.

New Update 1.1!

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Spacebar - Jump
  • G - Throw Grenade
  • Left Mouse - Shoot
  • Right Mouse - Jets
  • 1/2 - Switch Weapons
  • E - Take Pickups / Interact
  • I - Open Equipment Shop
  • Y - Chat
